description: Punie`s classmate and best friend. An avid Railfan, she is also the president of the school`s Railway Research Club. Despite being one of the regulars on the receiving end of Punie`s insidious plans - usually as a sacrificial lamb for traps laid by her enemies, she appears to be innocently oblivious of the true nature of Punie`s character.
name: Koku Tetsuko
